data.title: 2024 NBA Summer League Game Thread: Timberwolves at Pacers Preview
data.meta_description: The Minnesota Timberwolves are set to face off against the Indiana Pacers in their second game of the 2024 Summer League. This matchup will give Wolves fans another chance to see first-round...
data.text:
The Minnesota Timberwolves are set to face off against the Indiana Pacers in their second game of the 2024 Summer League. This matchup will give Wolves fans another chance to see first-round rookies Rob Dillingham and Terrence Shannon Jr. in action. In their debut against the New Orleans Pelicans, the rookie duo dazzled, giving Minnesota fans plenty of reasons to be optimistic. Shannon, in particular, shone brightly, scoring 25 points and proving he’s NBA-ready. Although Dillingham struggled with his shot, the 8th overall pick showcased his skills as a point guard, leading the team with 5 assists.

Beyond the rookies, Josh Minott and Leonard Miller also delivered solid performances, contributing to the Wolves’ 84-71 victory. These four players, along with Jaylen Clark, are poised to make significant impacts on the Wolves’ regular season campaign. Keep an eye on these key players as Minnesota takes the floor against Indiana.

Game Info

Who: Minnesota Timberwolves at Indiana Pacers

When: Sunday, July 14th at 4:30 PM CT

Where: Pavilion, Las Vegas, NV

TV: NBA TV
